name: Haus Hochwies
description:
Our house is on the Zillertal High Road to approximately 100m Surrounded by the Zillertal Alps. With a beautiful view of the Zillertal, we could be the perfect destination. The bus stop is directly below the house driveway. In winter, the ski bus to the ski resort of Mayrhofen Mountain Lifts (Penken Horberg). During the summer months you can go directly to the bus in the beautiful mountains of the Zillertal Alps to the Welte Melchboden. The Melchboden is a plateau at 2000m, from there you have to start numerous ways long walks or just enjoy the beautiful views and watch the paragliders at startup.
Check in: 13.00 - Check out: 10.00 
If you arrive after 18 clock we ask you this before telling us a quick call.
About the Inn valley motorway A12 to the Zillertal exit and from there another 30 km on the Zillertal Highway No. B169 up to Hippach - Schwendberg.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
60m ² apartment with 15m ² large bedroom.

The living and dining room there is additionally the sofa bed for the fifth Person.Hier in the living area there is also a large flat screen TV with satellite connection and a stereo system.

The kitchen is fully equipped for five people and the way you eat you have enough space for all to sit together.

The bathroom is equipped with shower and toilet.
